buy.description: Either the ID received from a Price Proposal (`proposal` call), or `1` if contract buy parameters are passed in the `parameters` field.

parameters.description: Used to pass the parameters for contract buy.

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

price.description: Maximum price at which to purchase the contract.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.
